characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings,  Edgedancer (mentioned),  Oathbringer (mentioned)

characterDescription:
Tezim is a warlord in Tukar who claims he's an aspect of the Almighty. He is the leader/god-priest of the Tukari people/religion. He is also Ishar, Herald of Luck, and he is quite mad.
However, Hauka thinks of him as a god-king.
